docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.30.2 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.30.2 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.29.4 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.29.4 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
docker buildx build --build-arg=kube_version=v1.28.9 --tag=image-prefix/cluster:staging-prefix-<VERSION>-k8s.v1.28.9 --platform=linux/amd64 --platform=linux/arm64 --push -f ./images/cluster/Dockerfile .
